description: Tourist E-Visa (Single/Multiple). Optimized for the official 'evisa.gov.bw' portal (Direct Government Track).

meta.fee_euro_approx: 300 BWP (~25 USD) for Single Entry | 500 BWP (~42 USD) for Multiple Entry
meta.max_stay: 30 Days (extendable to 90 days total in a year)
meta.min_funds_requirement: **Recommended Benchmark:** Approx. **100 USD per day** of stay to cover safari/lodging costs. Proof via 3 months' bank statements.

documents.title: Passport Bio Page
documents.description: Clear color scan of valid passport (6 months validity).

documents.title: Trip Schedule / Itinerary
documents.description: Day-wise travel plan including Safari bookings or Flight details. *Critical for approval.*

documents.title: Proof of Accommodation
documents.description: Hotel/Lodge booking confirmation or Letter from Host (with their Omang ID/Residence Permit copy).

documents.title: Proof of Funds
documents.description: Bank statements for the last 3 months showing sufficient balance for the trip.

documents.title: Yellow Fever Vaccination
documents.description: **Mandatory** if traveling from/through a Yellow Fever endemic country (e.g., Kenya, Ethiopia). *Note: India requires this for re-entry if you visit Africa.*

steps_flow.title: Register on Portal
steps_flow.description: Create an account on the official Government of Botswana E-Visa portal.

steps_flow.title: Submit Application
steps_flow.description:
Select 'Tourist Visa', upload documents (Passport, Photo, Itinerary, Hotel). 
* **Tip:** Ensure files are under 2MB.

steps_flow.title: Pay Fees
steps_flow.description: Pay **300 BWP** (Single) or **500 BWP** (Multiple) online using a Credit/Debit card.

steps_flow.title: Download E-Visa
steps_flow.description: Wait 7-14 days. Receive the 'Visa Approval Letter' via email. Print 2 copies to show at the border.
